Module WGUScheduler
Package com.example.wgusoftware2scheduler.Models

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
com.example.wgusoftware2scheduler.Models.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
A model class that represents a customer with an ID, name, address, phone, division, and postal code.

    • isCustomerValid

      public static void isCustomerValid(String name, String address, String phone, String stateProvince, String postalCode) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Validates the customer fields. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if any of the fields are invalid.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the customer
      address - the address of the customer
      phone - the phone of the customer
      stateProvince - the state/province of the customer
      postalCode - the postal code of the customer
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name is empty, or if it contains characters other than letters or spaces
      IllegalArgumentException - if the address is empty
      IllegalArgumentException - if the phone is empty or if it is not in the format (xxx) xxx-xxxx
      IllegalArgumentException - if the state/province is empty
      IllegalArgumentException - if the postal code is empty or if it is not in the format xxxxx or xxxxx-xxxx
